list-item.p: Preparation – The lead department in a municipality is mandated to drive climate change integration and establish an interdepartmental climate change response committee.
Analysis – climate change challenges are identified and assessed.
Strategy – the development of municipal climate change vision and strategy is done and climate change priorities are integrated into the IDP.
Projects – climate change priority projects are detailed and reviewed to align them to climate change dimensions.
Integration and Implementation – IDP programmes meet climate-responsive criteria (Department of Environmental Affairs 2011).
